name: State Ball
description:
Made for the "My First Game Jam" - game is incomplete and I might work on it in future, but this is what I have so far.

Controls are z, x, c and v

to reset to the start position use F9/F10. 

It's not as difficult as it seems at first, use a quick swap to bounce and back to ice to get up walls easily.

Made in Godot.
